name: GKMinmaxStrategist
desc: An AI that chooses moves in turn-based games using a deterministic strategy.

items.name: var maxLookAheadDepth: Int
items.desc: The number of future turns for the strategist to consider when planning moves.

items.name: func bestMove(for: GKGameModelPlayer) -> GKGameModelUpdate?
items.desc: Computes and returns the best possible move for the specified player.

items.name: func randomMove(for: GKGameModelPlayer, fromNumberOfBestMoves: Int) -> GKGameModelUpdate?
items.desc: Computes several of the best possible moves for the specified player, and returns a move randomly selected from among them.
